pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

meanings: approach (of a long jump, aircraft's flight, etc.)

pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: これらの図式は求職に関する様々なアプローチを示している。
lessons.english: These diagrams demonstrate different possible approaches to job seeking.

lessons.japanese: この分析には以下のアプローチがとられた。
lessons.english: The approach employed in this analysis was as follows.

lessons.japanese: うまいアプローチだね。
